author: tommyv43

review: Its nothing spectacular. The netflix app couldn't work. It took a long phone conversation with netflix to figure out i needed my credit card on the stick to get any of the apps to work. I don't like having my credit card info on the fire stick for multiple reasons one of which is I or the kids might accidentally pay for stuff. The paid stuff is front and center on the stick and the free or amazon prime stuff in the shadows. I'll give it another week and if it doesn't grow on me I'm sending it back.
author: Belita
